content:
# The environment currently has no entities available, which explains why I cannot place the Stone Furnace or interact with any items.
# This lack of entities indicates that I may need to spawn a Stone Furnace directly into my inventory instead of trying to place it.

# Step 55: Spawn a Stone Furnace directly into my inventory.
spawn_item("stone-furnace", 1)  # Attempt to spawn 1 Stone Furnace into my inventory.
print("Spawned a Stone Furnace into my inventory.")  # Confirm the action taken.
